name: STOP THE MARCH
description:
Stop The March is a Strategy Tower Defence Game by ATG STUDIOS. where the player has to stop a group of Protestants from Destroying the Nearby Homes of Villagers. Stop the Marchers by placing Cannons, Teslas, Barriers and many more; [NOTE: PLAY PC, Linux & Mac Builds for Best Experience.] USE MOUSE TO SELECT TOWERS AND SPAWN THEM INTO THE FIELD !!! USE WASD FOR MORE BOARD VIEW. The AIM is Simple,  You have to Protect all the Homes from the Marchers.
